  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcknowledgementDispatcher
AcknowledgementDispatcher is a PropertyChangeListener that respond to events that come from a controller after a player has done a correct action in order to send to the client the acknowledgement for that action.
ActionController
ActionController is the controller class that modify the model after an action request has been received by a client who is the active player.
ActionInputParser
ActionInputParser receives an action request from the UserInterface during his turn.
ActionMessageConstructor
ActionMessageConstructor will receive action from the ActionInputParser (by observing that class).
ActionPhaseOrder
ActionPhaseOrder is a strategy for the order of play calculation that is used to calculate the order at the beginning of a new Action Phase.
Assistant
Class Assistant represent an assistant card that is assigned to a player at the beginning of the game.
AssistantsTab
AssistantTab represent the assistant container in the tab pane of the gui main scene.
BackgroundColors
Enumeration BackgroundColors provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for changing color to text background.
Bag
The bag class represent the Bag during a game.
BaseMessageHandler
BaseMessageHandler is an abstract class that implements all functions that are needed for each MessageHandler (to reuse code).
Character1
Character1 is an CharacterCard that control 4 students; the character can insert a students from the students that he controls on an island, specified by the player who plays the character.
Character10
Character10 is a CharacterCard that is able to swap at maximum three students from the entrance and from the dining room of the player who plays the character.
Character11
Character11 is a CharacterCard that controls 4 students.
Character12
Character12 is a CharacterCard that is able to remote at maximum three students from all players dining rooms of a specific type.
Character3
Character3 is a CharacterCard that is able to update an island even if mother nature is not present on the island
Character5
Character5 is a CharacterCard that contains no entry tiles, and therefore it implements also the NoEntryTileManger interface.
Character7
Character7 is a CharacterCard that controls 6 students.
Character9
Character9 is a CharacterCard that can change the influence strategy of the player who plays the character with an NoStudentInfluenceStrategy.
CharacterCard
Abstract class CharacterCard provides all the behaviour that are common to all characters in the game.
CharacterController
CharacterController controls the character sub scene that appears in the main scene when a player selects a character image.
CharacterController
CharacterController handles a character action request by controlling if the input is correct and, if so, it constructs the input that will be given to requested character in the model package and call the corresponding method.
CharacterController.CharacterInputManager.ActionType
 
CharacterCreator
Class CharacterCreator is used to create a character card instance using factory method pattern.
CharacterImage
CharacterImage is a representation of a character in the main scene as a usable card
CharacterListener
CharacterListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to CharacterCard objects in order to inform clients for events that regard characters.
CharacterMapPrinter
CharacterMapPrinter role is to manage all the character map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of CharacterPrinter instance.
CharacterPrinter
CharacterPrinter role is to create every single box for specific character, after the creation all the created boxes are reunited by a single grid map by CharacterMapPrinter
CharacterTypeAdapter
CharacterTypeAdapter is a TypeAdapter of character cards implementation, used to write character cards into json files and to read them from json files.
CharacterWithoutInput
A CharacterWithoutInput is a CharacterCard that don't take any parameter from the player to play the card.
CLI
Class CLI is used to display the command line interface of the game
ClientConnection
ClientConnection is an interface that handles the connection between client and server, by sending messages to the client and receiving messages from the client
ClientMessageHeader
ClientMessageHeader represent the header of a MessageFromClient and contains all information that will help the ClientConnection that handle the connection with the client in forwarding the message to the correct handler of the message.
ClientMessageType
Enum class ClientMessageType represent the type of message that can be sent by a client to the server.
Cloud
Class Cloud represent a game cloud, that can contain some students (in base on how many players have the game) that are picked from the cloud at the end of a round by players
CloudListener
CloudListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to events that come from clouds after a player pick students from them.
CloudMapPrinter
CloudMapPrinter role is to manage all the cloud map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of PrintClouds instance.
CloudSubScene
CloudSubScene is used to represent the single cloud, with the addition of students on it when the game requests it
Colors
Enumeration Colors provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for changing color to text character.
ConnectionToServer
Class ConnectionToServer handles the connection between client and server by reading messages from the server and by asynchronously writing messages to the server.
Constants
Constants class provides all paths for images that need to be accessed by more than one classes, these are tower images, wizard images and student images
DefaultMessageHandler
DefaultMessageHandler handles all messages that have SERVER_MESSAGE as message type
DuplicateNicknameException
DuplicateNicknameException is thrown when a client chose a nickname that is already chosen by another client that is already connected (and is still connected) to the server.
EmptyBagException
EmptyBagException is thrown when some component of the model tries to pick students from the bag, but the bag is empty
EmptyCloudException
EmptyCloudException is thrown when a client tries to pick students from a cloud that doesn't have students (for example because someone else has already picked them from it).
EndGameListener
EndGameListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen events from Game when the game is finished
Eriantys
 
ErrorDispatcher
ErrorDispatcher is a PropertyChangeListener that will listen to controller objects in order to catch events that are fired when a client sends a malformed action.
ErrorMessageType
Enum class ErrorMessageType represents all the type of errors that will be sent to clients if they make some mistakes in sending messages to the server.
ErrorPopupController
ErrorPopupController is an error popup that contains an error info and can be displayed when the user commit an error.
ExpertFieldView
ExpertFieldView contains all information that are present only in an expert game, therefore it is used only for expert games.
ExpertGameMessageHandler
ExpertGameMessageHandler handles all messages that have GAME_UPDATE as message type and that regard an expert game
FieldView
FieldView is the part of the ModelView that contains all information about islands, clouds, professors and characters.
FullDiningRoomException
FullDiningRoomException is thrown when a client tries to insert a student to the dining room when the corresponding student dining room of the student is full.
FXMLController
FXMLController represents a generic controller of a javafx scene or sub scene.
GainInfluenceStrategy
GainInfluenceStrategy is a way of calculating the influence that consider also the fact that a player can have an advantage in the influence calculation (additional points).
Game
Game is the main class of the model package that contains associations to all components of the model.
GameConstants
 
GameController
GameController is the main class of the controller package that handles all actions that a client request by calling other controllers (TurnController and ActionController) methods.
GameLobby
GameLobby is the part of the Server that ius responsible for handling a particular game.
GameMainSceneController
GameMainSceneController controls the main scene (gameMainScene.fxml) of the game in the gui
GameSetupMessageHandler
GameSetupMessageHandler handles all messages that have GAME_SETUP as message type
GameUpdateMessageHandler
ExpertGameMessageHandler handles all messages that have GAME_UPDATE as message type and that regard a simple game
GenericBackgroundController
 
GlobalLobbyController
GlobalLobbyController controls the scene that contains the global lobby table
GUI
GUI is the main class of the graphical user interface of the client
IllegalCharacterActionRequestedException
IllegalCharacterActionRequestException is thrown when a client tries to play a character, but it has made some mistakes (for example the client request contains a character input that is not correct for the selected character or because the client has already played a character in the turn)
InfluenceStrategy
An InfluenceStrategy represent a way to calculate the influence on an island, and it is a player property during his turn.
InfluenceStrategyAdapter
InfluenceStrategyAdapter is the TypeAdapter implementation that is used to write InfluenceStrategy instances to a json and to read them from a json.
InitController
Class InitController is used for initialize the game and all its components
InputManager
Class InputManager gets all the inputs from the command line and pass it to the CLI function that request them, the class implements the Runnable interface; therefore, the run() method is run by a separated thread that constantly get an input from the command line.
Island
Island abstract class represent a generic island of the island map of the game.
IslandGroup
IslandGroup is an Island implementation for islands that are unified.
IslandListener
IslandListener is a PropertyChangeListener that will listen an island in order to inform a specific client that an event that regard the island was fired
IslandMap
IslandMap is used for represent the map of the islands in the main scene where mother nature, students and towers will move and appear/disappear during the game
IslandMapPrinter
IslandMapPrinter role is to manage all the island map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of a IslandPrinter instance.
IslandPrinter
IslandPrinter role is to create every single island box, after the creation all the created boxes are reunited by a single grid map by IslandMapPrinter
IslandSubScene
class IslandSubScene is used for represent the single islands with the addition of students, towers and mother nature on them during the game
IslandTypeAdapter
IslandTypeAdapter is the TypeAdapter implementation that is used to write Island instances to a json and to read them from a json.
JsonUtils
JsonUtils provides all static method to get information from configuration files that is useful during the game.
Lobby
Lobby create all different parts of the printed lobby on the command line interface, with the help of a LobbyPrintManager, for every specific case
LobbyInfo
LobbyInfo is a bean that represent the information of a specific game that will be printed on the global lobby table.
LobbyPrintManager
LobbyPrinterManager role is to print the exact lobby part for each specific case.
MapPrinter
MapPrinter role is to put together all difference maps
MessageAttribute
MessageAttribute is an attribute of the MessagePayload, that is used for both MessageFromServer and MessageFromClient.
MessageFromClient
MessageFromClient is the object that a client send to the server in the socket output stream.
MessageFromServer
MessageFromServer is the object that a client send to the server in the socket output stream.
MessageHandler
A message handler a client class that handles messages from the server.
MessagePayload
MessagePayload contains all the message attributes that are contained in a message (from both client and server).
ModelObserver
Interface ModelObserver defines some methods to automatically update some game aspects in response to some changes that are caused by player actions.
ModelView
ModelView is a light version of the model that is present on the client.
MotherNatureListener
MotherNatureListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to the Game in order to know when mother nature is moved by a player
MotherNatureMovementObservable
ModelObservable is the observable part of the Observer pattern, where the observed property is the position of mother nature in the islands
NoEntryTileManager
NoEntryTileManager is a container of no entry tiles that is able to dispatch no entry tiles to islands and to receive no entry tiles from islands
NormalInfluenceStrategy
This class provides the basic way of calculating an influence on an island (without any additional effects provided by a character).
NoStudentInfluenceStrategy
This class calculates the influence considering the fact that all students of a specific RealmType will not be considered during the influence calculation.
NoSuchAssistantException
NoSuchAssistantException is thrown when a client tries to play an assistant that was not found on his deck
NotEnoughCoinsException
NotEnoughCoinsException is thrown when a client tries to play a character, but he hasn't got enough coins to play it
NoTowerInfluenceStrategy
This class calculates the influence of a player in an island by not considering the eventual towers that are present on an island.
Pair<T,V>
Pair is a utility class that permit to associate two objects.
PersistenceGameInfo
PersistenceGameInfo contains all information that is needed to be saved from a game, this information will be used to properly restore a game that was previously saved on file.
PhaseOrder
PhaseOrder uses a Strategy pattern to calculate the current RoundPhase order.
PlanningPhaseOrder
PlanningPhaseOrder is a strategy for the order of play calculation that is used to calculate the order at the beginning of a new Planning Phase.
Player
Player contains the information of a player in the game
PlayerListener
PlayerListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to a Player instance and is associated the RemoteView that represent the player.
PlayerSetupHandler
PlayerSetupHandler is a PropertyChangeListener that will receive events from the user interface during the setup phase of the client and of the game (from the nickname choice to the wizard choice in the game).
PlayerSetupListener
PlayerSetupListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to the InitController in order to inform clients that a player has chosen a tower or a wizard in the setup phase.
PlayerView
PlayerView contains all information about a specific player that the client needs to know: school students, professors and towers, the type of tower and the type of wizard of the player, the last played assistant associated to the maximum movement that mother nature can be moved by him and (if the game is expert), the number of coins that the player have.
PopupDialogController
PopupDialogController is a dialog popup that ca be displayed on top of the current scene and does not permit to click anything that isn't on the popup.
PreviousGameController
PreviousGameController display a dialog scene that notifies the user that he was participating in a game before the server stopped.
PrintClouds
PrintClouds is used for creating the skeleton of the cloud with all dynamics information inside
PrintSchool
PrintSchool is used for creating the skeleton of the school with all dynamics information inside
PrintStaticMessage
PrintStaticMessage print the static message of the game.
ProfessorImage
ProfessorImage is a gui representation of a professor that has the shape of a hexagon filled with an image of a professor.
ProfessorPresenceObservable
Abstract class ProfessorPresenceObservable is the subject part of the observer pattern, that is observed by a ModelObserver.
RealmType
RealmType is an enumeration of all possible professors and students color.
RemoteView
RemoteView class act as if the view is present on the server, by receiving messages that are sent by the client (that are read by the ClientConnection) and by forwarding them to the controller.
RoundPhase
Enum class RoundPhase contains all possible phases of the round, each phase has a list of actions that can be done during it.
SaveGame
Class SaveGame contains all static methods used to save games states from all active games into files, to get games data from files and to delete games data files when a game is finished or deleted.
School
Class School represents a school that is assigned to a player.
SchoolBox
class used to initialize, modify and update the school box during the game with the drag and drop of students,addition of towers and professors
SchoolMapPrinter
SchoolMapPrinter role is to manage all the school map components that are printed on the command line interface with the help of a PrintSchool instance.
Server
Server class is the main class of the server side.
ServerMessageHeader
ServerMessageHeader represent the header of a MessageFromServer and contains all information that will help the ConnectionToServer that handle the connection with the server in forwarding the message to the correct handler of the message.
ServerMessageType
Enum class ClientMessageType represent the type of message that can be sent by a client to the server.
SetupChoiceSceneController
SetupChoiceController handles the setup phase of the game, from the game started message to the game initializations message
SimpleCharacter
SimpleCharacter is a character representation that is used to send characters initializations at the beginning of a game
SimpleField
SimpleField contains all information about islands (SimpleIslands), clouds, professors and characters (SimpleCharacters) that are sent at the beginning of the game to clients
SimpleIsland
SimpleIsland is an island representation that is used to send island updates during the game
SimpleModel
SimpleModel is light version of the model that is sent at the beginning of a restored game to restore clients information about the game
SimplePlayer
SimplePlayer is a player representation that is used to send school information at the beginning of a game
SingleIsland
SingleIsland is an Island implementation that represent a non-unified island in the game
SocketClientConnection
SocketClientConnection is a ClientConnection that handles the socket connection with the client by sending and reading messages through the socket.
Student
Class Student represent a Student in the game, which is associated to a specific RealmType
StudentContainer
StudentContainer contains students that are present on a character.
StudentContainerObservable
Abstract class StudentContainerObservable is the subject part of the observer pattern, where the observer is the ModelObserver.
StudentImage
StudentImage is gui representation of a student, which is a javafx circle that is filled with an image of a type of student.
StudentNotFoundException
StudentNotFoundException is thrown when someone tries to select a student from a place that doesn't have the selected student.
StudentsNumberInCloudException
StudentsNumberInCloudException is thrown when a component of the model tries to insert in a cloud a wrong number of students
TowerType
Enum TowerType contains all possible towers that a player can choose at the beginning of the game
TowerTypeAlreadyTakenException
TowerTypeAlreadyTakenException is thrown when a player tries to choose a tower that is already taken by another player
Triplet<T,V,R>
Triplet is a utility class that permits to associate tre objects together
TurnController
Class TurnController is used to maintain the order of play during the turn.
TurnEffect
Class Turn effect represent all information of a player during his turn; this information is valid only during the player turn and is reset at the end of the turn.
TurnHandler
Class TurnHandler is used to help the client when he is the current turn active player.
TurnListener
TurnListener is a PropertyChangeLister that listen the game controller to catch events that regard the end of a turn the end of a round phase.
TurnMessageHandler
ExpertGameMessageHandler handles all messages that have GAME_UPDATE as message type and that regard turns messages that notify the end of a turn or of a phase.
TurnPhase
Enum Class TurnPhase contains all possible states of a round.
UnicodeConstants
Enumeration UnicodeConstants provide all the constants of the unicode standard that are used for printing the CLI board.
UserHelper
Class UserHelper provides all the information to the player regarding how to call an action during the turn.
UserInterface
UserInterface is a common interface for both CLI and GUI that defines all methods that these have in common
View
Abstract class View represent the view part of the MVC pattern; the class is responsible to inform the controllers when an event that regard the view (without knowing that the real view is a remote client).
WelcomeController
WelcomeController handles the starting scene of the gui, the main menu and the game creation form
WizardType
Enum WizardType contains all possible wizards that a player can choose at the beginning of the game
WizardTypeAlreadyTakenException
WizardTypeAlreadyTakenException is thrown when a player tries to choose a wizard that is already taken by another player
WrongTurnActionRequestedException
WrongTurnActionRequestedException is thrown when a player tries to do an action that is not permitted in the current turn state.
